page.title: 03A SHROPSHIRE FARM
page.content:
The owner of{Chilton Farm}is Mr Richard Adney. He owns and farms 640 acres with the help of 2 permanent, 1 part time and 4 casual workers. He grows potatoes to sell to merchants, sugar beet for factories at Â£30 per tonne, oats to a porridge manufacturer and barley for beer and animal feed. He buys back beet pulp as animal feed at Â£127 per tonne.
Mr Adney's busiest times are March/April and June/December. The machines he uses are-: a 2 row planter, a 2 row harvester for potatoes which lifts 50/70 tonnes at a time, a sprayer, a plough, a rotary drill and a combine harvester. He uses a lot of chemicals and sprays.
